text:
According to the documentation

http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.5-doc/config/context.html

one should set the attribute reloadable of the context element to true, to enable
automatic class reloading during deploy. The setting has no effect no matter if it is set inside the server.xml or a separate context.xml.
creator: matthias@pueski.de
markt@apache.org
text: This works for me. From the issue description it appears you may not have a correct understanding of what this attribute is meant to do. Please ask on the users list if you need further assistance.
